results.content:
The first freelance course that I see that actually gives good tips and schematizes the roadmap in order to become a freelance web developer! 
Opposite to other courses I have seen that were just "redundant" talks an general sense information these course is giving me precious informations and tips. I was kinda lost, not knowing where to start and this is really helping me getting oriented. Thanks a lot Victor!
